content.prompt_es: Fill in the blanks using appropriate words to complete the sentences with correct inversion.
content.explanation: El uso de 'rarely' requiere inversión, por lo que se invierte 'I have seen'.
content.stimulus_en:
In the following sentences, fill in the gaps appropriately, employing the rules of inversion where needed.

___ I have seen such beautiful art before.

content.prompt_es: Fill in the blanks using appropriate words to complete the sentences with correct inversion.
content.explanation: La inversión se usa aquí por el uso de 'not only' al principio de la oración.
content.stimulus_en:
In the following sentences, fill in the gaps appropriately, employing the rules of inversion where needed.

___ did she finish her work on time, but she also helped others.

content.prompt_es: Fill in the blanks using appropriate words to complete the sentences with correct inversion.
content.explanation: La inversión se forma con 'hardly' para expresar que algo ocurre con dificultad.
content.stimulus_en:
In the following sentences, fill in the gaps appropriately, employing the rules of inversion where needed.

___ did the movie start, but the audience was already captivated.

content.prompt_es: Fill in the blanks using appropriate words to complete the sentences with correct inversion.
content.explanation: 'No sooner' indica que algo ocurrió casi inmediatamente después, requiriendo inversión.
content.stimulus_en:
In the following sentences, fill in the gaps appropriately, employing the rules of inversion where needed.

___ had I left the house when it started to rain.

content.explanation: La palabra 'seldom' introduce una inversión, destacando la rareza de la situación.

In the following sentences, fill in the gaps appropriately, employing the rules of inversion where needed.

___ can you find someone as dedicated as her.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct answer for each of the following sentences that use mixed conditionals.
content.explanation: En esta oración, el tiempo pasado 'had attended' sugiere que ella no asistió a la reunión. El resultado en el presente es 'would be', que indica que ahora estaría mejor informada.
content.stimulus_en: If she had attended the meeting, she ___ better informed about the project now.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct answer for each of the following sentences that use mixed conditionals.
content.explanation: El uso de 'had' es correcto aquí porque implica una situación pasada que afecta el resultado presente. Se forma así un condicional mixto.
content.stimulus_en: If I ___ more time last week, I would have completed the report by now.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct answer for each of the following sentences that use mixed conditionals.
content.explanation: En esta oración, 'were' se usa en la parte del condicional presente y 'would have gotten' se usa para indicar que no recibió la promoción en el pasado debido a su falta de experiencia.
content.stimulus_en: If he were more experienced, he ___ the promotion last year.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct answer for each of the following sentences that use mixed conditionals.
content.explanation: Aquí, 'had known' sugiere que no estaban al tanto de la fecha límite en el pasado, y 'would have made' se utiliza para expresar una acción que no ocurrió.
content.stimulus_en: If they had known about the deadline, they ___ more effort to meet it.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct answer for each of the following sentences that use mixed conditionals.
content.explanation: El uso de 'were' muestra una condición presente no cumplida, y 'would have finished' describe un resultado pasado que no se realizó.
content.stimulus_en: If our team were stronger, we ___ the last project last quarter.

content.prompt_es: What term describes a balanced approach to physical and mental health?
content.explanation: El término 'well-being' se refiere a un estado de salud positiva y equilibrio en la vida.

content.prompt_es: Which word refers to the process of improving oneself through activities or education?
content.explanation: El 'personal development' implica actividades que mejoran la vida personal o profesional.

content.prompt_es: What lifestyle choice focuses on consuming natural and organic products?
content.explanation: 'Sustainable living' se refiere a un estilo de vida que busca reducir el impacto ambiental mediante elecciones conscientes.

content.prompt_es: What term is used for the practice of mindfulness and meditation?
content.explanation: 'Mindfulness' es una práctica que implica estar presente y consciente en el momento actual.

content.prompt_es: Which term describes the choices we make to promote our health?
content.explanation: El término 'lifestyle' abarca las decisiones que afectan nuestra salud y bienestar general.
